name: itm-marketplace-mvp
description: IT Marketplace 'Domestic Solutions' - Root project for managing services and frontend.

scripts.postinstall: cd services/users-service && npm install && cd ../companies-service && npm install && cd ../operator-service && npm install && cd ../../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev:build: npm run services:build && npm run frontend:start
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run services:fresh && npm run frontend:start
scripts.services:fresh: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build -d && node scripts/show-urls.js
scripts.logs:services: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f users-service companies-service operator-service

author: AI Assistant & User
